name: Subhadeep Datta
title: Full Stack Engineer & Technical Leader
shortBio: I build fast, scalable systems and lead engineering teams. Currently CTO at Noisiv Consulting. Obsessed with performance, clean architecture, and making technology actually work.
longBio: I'm a full stack engineer focused on building systems that scale. Over the past 6 years, I've worked on everything from real-time APIs to distributed systems and machine learning pipelines. Right now, I'm a CTO and co-founder at Noisiv Consulting, where I lead a team building enterprise solutions. I care about performance, maintainability, and shipping things that matter.
headline: Full Stack Engineer & CTO

site.name: Subhadeep Datta — Tech Leader & Full Stack Engineer
site.description: Portfolio of Subhadeep Datta — Tech Co-founder & CTO specializing in distributed systems, enterprise architecture, LLMs, MCP, and RAG solutions. 6+ years building scalable backend systems with 99.9% uptime.

projects.title: Noisiv Consulting
projects.description: Co-founded and lead engineering at Noisiv — an enterprise technology consulting firm. Built scalable backend systems serving Fortune 500 clients, designed database architectures, and scaled the engineering team from 0 to 25+. Work spans Java, Python, Node.js, and modern DevOps. It's where most of my learnings on distributed systems and team leadership come from.

projects.title: QID — Digital Verification Platform
projects.description: Built and led the team for a digital check-in platform used for verifications. The interesting part wasn't the frontend — it was handling offline-first sync and integrating with India's identity systems. Worked with constraints: low bandwidth, critical accuracy, and massive scale.

projects.title: Realtime Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A WebSocket-based analytics dashboard. The challenge was handling real-time updates for thousands of data points without blocking the UI. Learned a lot about rendering optimization and efficient state management here.

experience.summary: Leading engineering teams building enterprise solutions. Focused on architecture, performance, and scaling systems that matter.
Built and scaled a digital verification platform from ground up. Led team of engineers, handled everything from API design to infrastructure.
Early-stage work building products and learning the craft. Mentored developers and shipped features that reached users.

awards.title: COVID-19 Hero
awards.description: Built and launched Bharat Oxygen platform in 72 hours, connecting 1,500+ users with life-saving oxygen and medical resources during the COVID-19 crisis.

leadership.summary: Leading 25+ engineers across backend, frontend, and DevOps teams. Architecting enterprise solutions for Fortune 500 clients.
Led cross-functional engineering team delivering mission-critical check-in platform with 99.9% uptime.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
